metadata.Title: CVE-2020-29663 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Icinga 2 v2.8.0 through v2.11.7 and v2.12.2 has an issue where revoked certificates due for renewal will automatically be renewed, ignoring the CRL. This issue is fixed in Icinga 2 v2.11.8 and v2.12.3.

criterions.comment: icinga2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
